segments.text: I see the girl standing there, hand outstretched, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and she’s just standing there like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts her brother too much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But they’re working together, and it’s kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get in trouble when their mom turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting closer, and I’m worried they’ll slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll even notice the mess before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
